name: ChildProtectOnline
overview: ChildProtectOnline is an application you download from childprotectonline.com onto you and your childs mobile phone. It takes 10 minutes to install and is easy to use and allows parents to: Monitor texting: So that your child does not receive inappropriate messages from someone that could put them at risk. Know who is communicating with your child and what they are saying: So that you can regain control and protect your child from negative influences. Determine who they can call: So that you can be sure your child is only communicating with trusted people. Flag inappropriate words or phrases: So that your child is not exposed to adult material in cyberspace. Maintain a log of incoming and outgoing calls: So that you can track any suspicious behavior that could put your child at risk. Locate your child at any time using GPS technology and track their movements in minute-by-minute increments so you can to locate your child instantly in case of emergencies. You will know if your child leaves a trusted location or enters a dangerous location. Set up email notifications tailored to the type of information you need to be aware of to keep your child safe at all times.
